meanings.definition: (インドネシア語)うずくまる、しゃがむ、かがむ

examples.translation: He/She squatted in the corner of the room.
examples.english_translation: He/She squatted in the corner of the room.

examples.translation: The child huddled because he/she was cold.
examples.english_translation: The child huddled because he/she was cold.
